lead_paragraph: Croatia coach Ante Cacic has included a handful of promising youngsters to complement the stalwarts in his 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France.

headline.print_headline: Cacic Blends Croatian Youth With Experience for Euro 2016
headline.main: Cacic Blends Croatian Youth With Experience for Euro 2016

snippet: Croatia coach Ante Cacic has included a handful of promising youngsters to complement the stalwarts in his 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France....
